# Keybindings Reference

*Auto-generated from configuration files*

## Normal Mode

| Key | Description | Source |
|-----|-------------|--------|
| `<A-n>` | Next reference | lsp-enhancements |
| `<A-p>` | Previous reference | lsp-enhancements |
| `<C-S-N>` | Harpoon next | bookmarks |

## Visual Mode

| Key | Description | Source |
|-----|-------------|--------|
| `<leader>sc` | Screenshot code | productivity-tools |
| `<leader>sw` | Search current word | enhanced-search |

## Visual Block Mode

| Key | Description | Source |
|-----|-------------|--------|
| `<leader>re` | Extract function | code-quality |
| `<leader>rf` | Extract to file | code-quality |
| `<leader>rv` | Extract variable | code-quality |
